s0051: Min Wang once claimed emperor title, later abandoned it.
s0053: Disliked world eloquent scholars, none trusted.

s0057: When Rang Hou as Qin general, moreover wished cross Han, Wei attack Qi Gang Shou, wished broaden his Tao fief.
s0059: Minister heard enlightened lord establishes governance, have merit not dare not reward, have ability not dare not appoint, labor great their salary thick, merit many their rank noble, able govern masses their office great.

s0065: Now minister breast not sufficient match executioner's block, waist not sufficient await axe, how dare with doubtful matter test on king!

s0067: Moreover minister heard Zhou has whetstone, Song has knot jade, Liang has hanging smartweed, Chu has harmony catalpa, these four treasures, soil birth, skilled artisan loss, yet become world famous vessels.

s0078: Then Qin Zhao Wang greatly delighted, then apologized Wang Ji, made with relay carriage summon Fan Sui.
s0079: Then Fan Sui got see at detached palace, feigned as not know everlasting lane entered among.
